Articles.Content:
> 
> I'm actually using RoverDudes LH fuelled nuke engines atm.

Stock nukes will also only run on LF.

> 
> Also, they weren't fully balanced to begin with. Radial engines are probably the only ones left unchanged.

I hope they get buffed heavily. Until now they've been useless for the most part.
Adding my HYPE! to the cause.

> 
> Stock nukes will also only run on LF.
> I hope they get buffed heavily. Until now they've been useless for the most part.

Which radial engines?

It's monday here in GMT +1, Where's my update?

Also, hype!

> 
> Adding my HYPE! to the cause.

Welcome! Did you bring your OMGDARELEASEIZTOMORROWWW with you?

I cant wait to try a nuke powered spaceplane. No oxidizer needed at all! I was always so upset that I had to add two different fuel tanks for nuclear spaceplanes, but not anymore!

One other thing I have been thinking about since re-entry effects were announced, Is Eve going to be hot like Venus? I know the atmosphere is going to be like pea soup, but will stuff overheat faster too?

Cant wait to find out!

> 
> Which radial engines?

All of them!
Only one moar page!

> 
> Which radial engines?

All of them had an inexplicable lower ISP than their in-line counterparts. Also, probably a lower TWR.

> 
> Which radial engines?

Honestly, there needs to be more radial attachment stuff to radially attach engines with.
Moar butter!

> 
> All of them!

IMO, the big radial engine is overpowered.

> 
> IMO, the big radial engine is overpowered.

That thing is terrible!

0.9 ton, 120 thrust at 320/360 DV. Terribly inefficient for a lander.

We have made 187 pages.

Because hype.
There is so little time left and so much more hype to make...

Hypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeityhypeity

Edit: How did you get past the forums autocorrect of all caps?

Mmmmm, butter.

Happy landings!
The real question: will the servers be able to support ALL the downloads?
